```{r}
library(readxl)
data <- read_excel("D:/dataset/報告用.xlsx")
fm <-lm(CBR~ER+CR+YAR+LOWR, data)
summary(fm)

```
```{r}
fm1 <-lm(CBR~ER+YAR+LOWR, data)
summary(fm1)
```

```{r}
plot(fitted(fm1),resid(fm1),xlab="fitted value", ylab="Residul", main="Residual Plot")
abline(0,0,col = "red", lty = 2)




```
```{r}
plot(fm1,las=1)

```



```{r}
plot(data$ER,resid(fm1),xlab="ER", ylab="Residul", main="Residual Plot vs ER")
```

```{r}
plot(data$YAR,resid(fm1),xlab="YAR", ylab="Residul", main="Residual Plot vs YAR")
```

```{r}
plot(data$LOWR,resid(fm1),xlab="LOWR", ylab="Residul", main="Residual Plot vs LOWR")
```

```{r}
library(car)
fm1 <-lm(CBR~ER+YAR+LOWR, data)
vif(fm1)
```
